department.ch: 永續綠能科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master Programs, Sustainability in Green Energy

goal.ch: 本課程目標在使學生了解太陽熱能、太陽光能之基本原理與應用，以培養國內太陽能領域相關人才。
goal.en: This course aims at cultivating talents in the field of solar technology. Students will learn the fundamental knowledge and the applications of photovoltaic and solar thermal technologies.

outline.ch:
1 The characteristics of solar radiation
2 The characteristics of Semiconductors
3 The characteristics of P-n junctions
4 The behavior of solar cells
5 Applications of photovoltaic systems
6 Introduction to solar thermal engineering
7 Performance Analysis of Solar Thermal system
8 Advanced Collectors --- Concentrating Collector
9 Thermal Energy Storage
10 Application of Solar Thermal Systems
outline.en:
